3i Infrastructure Plc, a Jersey-based investment firm specializing in infrastructure investments, has agreed to acquire 100% stake in Global Cloud Xchange Ltd (GCX), a UK-based communications service provider and fibre optic networks for a consideration of USD512 million.

The investment in GCX will support its future growth.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)512
Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategoryInstitutional Buy-out (IBO)
Deal StatusAnnounced: 2021-11-17

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Global Cloud Xchange Limited
Acquirer (Company)3i Infrastructure plc

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition100%
